    • Method Detail

      • configureAvroSource

        public void configureAvroSource(Collector<OUT> collector)
        Configures the AvroSource. Also sets the collector so the application can use it from outside of the invoke function.
        Parameters:
        collector - The collector used in the invoke function

      • invoke

            throws Exception

        Parameters:
        collector - The Collector for sending data to the datastream
        Throws:
        Exception
